name: Quartermaster
description: Y'know, they say there was an old game, old before those new limelight highs... It was quite a simple one, just stack pieces on top of each other. Can you believe it?
author: Logistics' officer rumor

name: Industrial Reprocessing
description: Waste not, want not... And we will want the profits, so ya lot better wheel those back to the plants.
author: Industrial Crew Overseer, Lemat (attributed)
